column4: hey, got a quick question, what is the deal with trying to install dofus on ubuntu 11.04?? dofus is a program that uses adobe air to install, it wont install at all for me.
also, has anyone had any glitches or issues with the screensaver?? rss-glx and nvidia graphics cards?
screensaver crashed for me earlier today, after upgading. I disabled it
the drivers are usually done automatically, if you selected the box for non-free software at the beginning of the install
